meanings.sent1: I learned in school that a million is a very big number.
meanings.sent2: She saved millions of pennies in her piggy bank.
meanings.sent3: It would take millions of ants to carry that giant apple!
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky looked like millions of twinkling diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The field was covered in millions of colorful flowers, creating a beautiful sight.

meanings.definition: A very large number or amount.
meanings.sent1: There were millions of bubbles floating in the air after the bubble machine was turned on.
meanings.sent2: He had to count millions of grains of sand for his science project.
meanings.sent3: The chef added millions of sprinkles to the cake, making it look like a rainbow.
meanings.sent4: The sound of millions of raindrops hitting the roof was soothing to her ears.
meanings.sent5: The library had millions of books, each waiting to be explored by curious minds.
